fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm auto-upgrade logs fetch failures
fields.request_details:
1. In the deployment git repo, temporarily rename the origin remote (e.g., `git remote rename origin origin-backup`).
2. Run `python manage.py shell -c "from core.tasks import check_github_updates; check_github_updates()"` to trigger the auto-upgrade task.
3. Restore the git remote name with `git remote rename origin-backup origin`.
4. Open the Upgrade Report admin page and confirm a new entry was added showing the Git fetch failure details (including the exit code and git error message).
